data.name: Business and Financial Operations
data.description: Includes Accountant, Accounting Manager, Auditor, Sales Manager, Financial Advisor, Chief Financial Officer, Dealer, Agent etc.

data.name: Administrative
data.description: Includes Secretary, Administrative Assistant, Office Manager, Office Assistant, Apartment Locator, Personal Assistant, Branch Manager etc.

data.name: Education and Library
data.description: Includes Educator, Instructor, Teacher, Professor, Lecturer, Research Assistant, Tutor, Librarian, Principal etc.

data.name: Management
data.description: Includes Manager, Supervisor, Director, President, Chairman etc.

data.name: Sales
data.description: Includes Sales, Sales Assistant, Retail Manager, Realtor, Consultant, Customer Service Representative, Cashier etc.

data.name: IT and Technical
data.description: Users in the IT and Technical industry.

data.name: Legal
data.description: Includes Lawyer, Corporate Counsel, Partner, Paralegal, Attorney, Facilitator, Judge, Referee, Public Defender, Prosecutor, Solicitor, Judicial Clerk etc.

data.name: Retail
data.description: Covers all people who *currently* work in the retail industry.

data.name: Temporary and Seasonal
data.description: Includes Cleaner, Driver, Food Server, Volunteer, Parking Attendant, Janitor etc.

data.name: Personal Care
data.description: Includes Stylist, Homemaker, Assistant, Personal Trainer, Tour Guide, Nanny, Receptionist, Babysitter etc.

data.name: Arts, Entertainment, Sports and Media
data.description: Includes Photographer, Artist, Actor, Actress, Director, Designer, Freelance Writer, Journalist, Singer, Musician etc.

data.name: Production
data.description: Represents the Production Industry. This industry contains the largest number of distinct occupations, and represents all occupations which output product (from food to metals to woodwork, etc).

data.name: Transportation and Moving
data.description: Includes Driver, Operator, Sea Captain, Flight Attendant, Pilot, Dispatcher, Mail Carrier etc.

data.name: Architecture and Engineering
data.description: Includes Software Engineer, Technician, Electrician, Technical Engineer, Machinist, Architect, Civil Engineer, Scientist, Surveyor, Research Assistant, Scientist etc.

data.name: Food Preparation and Services
data.description: Includes Cashier, Server, Waiter, Waitress, Chef, Bartender, Barista, Line Cook, Sandwich Artist, Dish Washer, Store Manager etc.

data.name: Construction and Extraction
data.description: Includes Service Technician, Electrician, Brick Layer, Mechanic, Machine Operator, Laborer, Welder, Carpenter, Painter and Decorator, Plumber etc.

data.name: Healthcare and Medical
data.description: Includes Physician, Dentist, Nurse etc.

data.name: Installation and Repair
data.description: Includes Technician, Operator, Mechanic, Electrician, Welder, Repair Technician, Delivery Driver, Installer, Lineman etc.

data.name: Life, Physical, and Social Science
data.description: Includes Professor, Technician, Chemist, Psychologist, Consultant, Policy Officer, Scientist, Researcher, Radiographer, Therapist, Geologist etc.

data.name: Computer and Mathematics
data.description: Includes Software Engineer, Computer Scientist, Professor, Project Manager, Analyst, Technical Support Specialist, IT Specialist, Scientist etc.

data.name: Community and Social Services
data.description: Includes Minister, Social Worker, Pastor, Missionary, Counselor, Therapist, Politician, Chaplain etc.

data.name: Protective Service
data.description: Includes Security Guard, Security Agent, Security Officer, Sergeant, Life Guard, Police Officer, Firefighter, Detective etc.

data.name: Farming, Fishing and Forestry
data.description: Includes Farmer, Farm Hand, Ranch Manager, Rider, Crew Member, Pilot, Handyman, Hunter etc.

data.name: Cleaning and Maintenance
data.description: Includes Cleaner, Janitor, Inspector, Service Technician, Mower Operator, Housekeeper, Heavy Equipment Operator, Gardener, Handyman etc.

data.name: Military
data.description: Military users (both active and inactive).

data.name: Veterans (US)
data.description: People who were previously employed by the US Military

data.name: Government Employees
data.description: Government Employees (worldwide).

data.name: Nurses
data.description: People who are nurses.
